text:
Cincinnati Public Schools
Claude V. Courier, superintendent
608 EAST MCMILLAN STREET
CINCINNATI 6, OHIO
JOAN K.BOLLENBACHER
SUPERVISOR.
APPRAISAL SERVICES
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
September 26, 1958
National Association of Educational Broadcasters ,â– 
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skoraia:
In a recent report on the use of educational television compiled "by
Katherine Glendinning and Veronica Casey of the Denver Public Schools
it was mentioned that you had conducted similar surveys which bear out
the findings of their report.
We would be most interested in receiving a copy of your report for
purposes of further study. Thank you for your attention.
Sincerely yours.
/James N. Jacobs,
Assistant, Appraisal Services
Cincinnati Public Schools
JNJ:bss
